summary: Just a simple Follower, who is found in Whiterun\\\'s Dragonsreach.
descriptionHtml:
[size=20][b][color=#FA9222]Derek the Follower[/color][/b][/size]
[size=20][b][u]PICTURES COMING SOON[/u][/b][/size]

[size=5][b][color=#E07D13]Installation:[/color][/b][/size]
Install using the Download Manager, or Install Manually
There is no need for Dragonborn, Heathfire, Dawngaurd, or SKE.

[size=5][b][color=#E07D13]Backstory:[/color][/b][/size]
   [i]\"Derek used to be a thin, little farmer boy. He grew up to be a tough warrior, and set out for adventures. He faced many dangers, but came back victorious. His family\'s honor grew, as did their wealth. But, his family was killed by raiders, and now he will seek his vengeance by killed any evil he comes across.\"[/i]

[size=5][b][color=#E07D13]Other Mods:[/color][/b][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42308/?]Nightingales Revenge[/url]
author: FoggedOut
